title: Scrollbar should actually reflect content
body: I'm not sure this counts as a bug because it's always been like this but it certainly looks like one.

comments.body: In properties/Layout you can change the size of it I believe.
I agree. A scrollbar like most applications that resizes and/or disappears based on content length would greatly increase usability.
